text: Bias at my school My school seems to have a problem with kids getting into trouble  Especially if it s an argument between a guy and a girl  Most of our teachers are female  and a surprising amount of them are biased towards the girl students  particularly in  st to  th grades  I m not saying all of them are  far from it actually  Even with nice teachers  I ll never forget the times as a little kid when a girl hits and kicks me  says I did it and gets me in trouble  or when I need to stay in at break because of a misunderstanding  when our teacher won t even listen to one word a crying   year old is saying  Some more examples of this is the bathrooms and changing rooms  The girls get a massive room with several stalls in a tucked away corner  while the boys rooms are minuscule in comparison  have   urinals and   stall  stink to high heaven  and maybe the worst thing is that they are right at the end of a hallway  If someone opens the door  you can see whoever is peeing  with only the privacy of our backs turned to the door  On school trips  when we change to  swim clothes  the girls get the boat house  with plenty of cover  and we get told to run into the forest  The girls get the special houses with Netflix and YouTube  but we get the crappy ones with missing beds and a single news station on an old tv that barely works  It s not as much of a problem in the older classes  but I ve been at my school for a while  and we re taught that the way to win an argument is to be female and cry  Don t mistake this as misogynistic and downvote this to hell  I m just stating a problem
summary: There is a problem with girls getting into trouble at my school. Most of the teachers are female and they are biased towards the girl students. The girls get a massive room with several stalls in a tucked away corner while the boys rooms are minuscule and have urinals and stalls right at the end of the hallway. On school trips the girls get the boat house with plenty of cover and the boys get the crappy houses with missing beds and a single news station on an old tv that barely works.
cleaned: problem girl get trouble school teacher female biased girl student girl massive room stall tuck away corner boy room minuscule urinal stall right end hallway school trip girl boat house plenty cover boy crappy house miss bed single news station old barely work
